description: Phrases for discussing fears, failures, and overcoming challenges

phrases.exampleSentence: Atsiprašau, aš nesuprantu, kur yra problema?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Excuse me, I don't understand, where is the problem?

phrases.exampleSentence: Aš pagalvojau. Manau, kad aš turiu sprendimą!
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I thought about it. I think I have a solution!

phrases.exampleSentence: Aš bijau. Mano baimė didelė.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I am afraid. My fear is big.

phrases.exampleSentence: Šis stalas atrodo senas, bet jis yra stiprus.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: This table looks old, but it is strong.

phrases.exampleSentence: Aš dar studijuoju. Aš esu jaunas žmogus.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I am still studying. I am a young person.

phrases.english: I have three ways out / three exits.
phrases.exampleSentence: Nėra tik vieno kelio. Turiu tris išeitis.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: There is not only one way. I have three ways out.

phrases.english: I have the right to speak.
phrases.exampleSentence: Nekalbėk už mane. Aš turiu teisę kalbėti.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Don't speak for me. I have the right to speak.

phrases.exampleSentence: Tu sakei 'ne'. Gal aš klystu?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: You said 'no'. Maybe I am wrong?

phrases.exampleSentence: Aš turiu dirbti šiandien. Tai yra mano pareiga.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I have to work today. It is my duty.

phrases.exampleSentence: Daugelis sako 'taip', bet aš esu prieš.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Many people say 'yes', but I am against (it).

phrases.exampleSentence: Noriu pamatyti naujienas. Kur žiniasklaida?
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I want to see the news. Where is the media?

phrases.exampleSentence: Tavo nuomonė yra teisinga.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Your opinion is fair/correct.

phrases.english: I am afraid to make a mistake.
phrases.exampleSentence: Prieš egzaminą aš visada bijau klysti.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Before the exam, I am always afraid to make a mistake.

phrases.exampleSentence: Nepasisekė. Tai yra nesėkmė.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: It didn't work out. That is a failure.

phrases.exampleSentence: Niekas baisaus. Aš galiu bandyti dar kartą.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Nothing terrible. I can try again.

phrases.exampleSentence: Šiandien man reikia sėkmės, nes turiu susitikimą.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Today I need good luck, because I have a meeting.

phrases.exampleSentence: Tu gerai moki. Nebijok kalbėti!
phrases.sentenceTranslation: You know well. Don't be afraid to speak!

phrases.exampleSentence: Nesu tikras, bet noriu bandyti naują maistą.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: I am not sure, but I want to try the new food.

phrases.english: He makes mistakes all the time.
phrases.exampleSentence: Jis skuba, todėl klysta visada.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: He rushes, so he makes mistakes all the time.

phrases.exampleSentence: Net po nesėkmės, mokytis yra svarbu.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Even after failure, to learn is important.

phrases.exampleSentence: Turi idėją, todėl tu gali tai padaryti!
phrases.sentenceTranslation: You have an idea, so you can do it!

phrases.exampleSentence: Klysti yra gerai. Mokykis iš klaidų.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: To make mistakes is good. Learn from mistakes.

phrases.exampleSentence: Nors nepasisekė, tai yra gera patirtis.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Although it didn't succeed, that is a good experience.

phrases.exampleSentence: Nebijok kalbėti. Būk drąsus!
phrases.sentenceTranslation: Don't be afraid to speak. Be brave!

phrases.exampleSentence: Nereikia nerimauti. Viskas bus gerai.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: No need to worry. Everything will be fine.

phrases.exampleSentence: Rezultatas nežinomas, bet svarbu yra bandyti.
phrases.sentenceTranslation: The result is unknown, but it is important to try.

phrases.exampleSentence: Po darbo ir pastangų, laukia sėkmė!
phrases.sentenceTranslation: After work and effort, success is waiting!
